subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Bills have suddenly become the team to beat in the A.F.C. East. But there is always at least a little hill for Buffalo to climb — they lost four consecutive Super Bowls, after all.
snippet: The Bills have suddenly become the team to beat in the A.F.C. East. But there is always at least a little hill for Buffalo to climb — they lost four consecutive Super Bowls, after all.
